user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

score = #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
